    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init()
        Instantialize the Elasticsearch Connector through: 1) reading the properties 2) creating the index (db) in Elasticsearch for handling the evaluation metrics' results and raw data.

      • getElasticSearchClient

        public static org.elasticsearch.client.RestHighLevelClient getElasticSearchClient()
        Get an instantiation of Elasticsearch
        Returns:
        instantiation of Elasticsearch

      • createIndex

        public static void createIndex​(java.lang.String index_name)
        This method is for creating indexes in Elasticsearch. It first checks if ES is reachable and then check if the index exists or not. If not, it will create it with the following parameter:
        Parameters:
        index_name - : the name of the index to be created

      • createIndex

        public static void createIndex​(java.lang.String index_name,
                               java.lang.String index_mapping)
        This method is for creating indexes in Elasticsearch. It first checks if ES is reachable and then check if the index exists or not. If not, it will create it with the following parameters:
        Parameters:
        index_name - : the name of the index to be created
        index_mapping - : the mapping of the index (schema of the index in ES)

      • ingestRawData

        public static void ingestRawData​(java.util.Vector<TimeRecord> records,
                                 java.lang.String id)
        ingestRawData is a method for inserting the data to ES. It inserts all the raw data along with the target and output.
        Parameters:
        records - : the records that need to be processed
        id - : the project name or the hostname depending on the project requirements

      • ingestMetricValues

        public static void ingestMetricValues​(java.util.Map<Metric,​java.util.Vector<java.lang.Double>> metricsEvaluation,
                                      java.lang.String id)
        ingestMetricValues is a method for inserting the metrics values to ES. It inserts all the evaluation mertrics' values to monitor the performance of the model
        Parameters:
        records - : the records that need to be processed
        id - : the project name or the hostname depending on the project requirements
